dialogue.content: My wheelchair seat is starting to feel very hot and sweaty after an hour.
Poor ventilation can cause skin breakdown. What kind of cushion is it?
It's a solid foam one, it doesn't breathe at all.
A gel-top or a honeycomb-style cushion would allow for much better airflow.
I'm not techy, but I can ask my physical therapist about them at our next visit.
Good idea. Ask specifically about 'breathable' materials.
I'll make sure to ask my PT about a honeycomb cushion to stay cool.
